reviews.text: Very poor service. Toilets blocked. No way of getting food since the shop wants to shut before 8pm. This is during a World Cup cricket match. Go figure. Very poor and management at the station need to take action or close up or sell up and let people manage this.
Why do I have to give these robbers even a single star? Do yourself a favour. DON'T PARK HERE. THEY WILL ROB YOU. Get a taxi instead.

Pretty poor. Ticket machine crashed as we came off a three hour delayed flight and were racing to catch our train, and staff on the platforms seemed more concerned with their cigarette breaks - lady in the queue had to attract their attention despite their being feet away. Very unimpressed.

I was travelling yesterday 23/12/17. Cross country called a strike and I was travelling to Cleethorpes. There was no way I could travel on any other day as I was only flying in that morning. Unsure of what I should do I asked at the ticket desk and the young man asked for my ticket, put the information in the computer and gave me a print out of all the changes I had to make to get to my final destination.  Instead of the one change I now had five. The ticket told me the time I was arriving in each station and the time I was due to leave which was very helpful as I then knew how long I had to get to the next platform.  the changes were between 4 and 15 minutes.  I arrived at my destination unfrazzled after a very straight forward trip. But I wouldn't have if it had not been for the boys in Southampton Parkway so I just want to say a very big thank you and a very happy Christmas to them.  X
